column1: 21950,Marvel Adventures Fantastic Four (2005) #40,40,3715,273,"A secret organization has taken to harvesting the most brilliant brains in the world and they've decided to go for the big enchilada - Reed Richards. Is this the end of the Fantastic Four? What will Reed Richards do without his brain? Will Iron Man take his spot in the FF?  Or have we just lost OUR minds? Check out this issue we had to call ""Mind Over Matter!"",2008,9
